SELECT P.POST_SEQ, M.USER_NICKNAME, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_FILEPATH, P.POST_POSITION_NAME, IC.CAMERA_SERIAL, P.POST_READCOUNT, LIKE_TABLE.LIKE_COUNT FROM POST P, POST_LOCATION PC, MEMBER M, INFO_CAMERA IC, (SELECT po.post_seq, (select count(a.user_seq) from post_like a where a.post_seq = po.post_seq) as like_count from post po) LIKE_TABLE WHERE P.USER_SEQ = M.USER_SEQ AND P.POST_SEQ = PC.POST_SEQ AND P.CAMERA_SEQ = IC.CAMERA_SEQ AND P.POST_SEQ = LIKE_TABLE.POST_SEQ AND (PC.LATITUDE BETWEEN #{infoSouth} AND #{infoNorth}) AND (PC.LONGITUDE BETWEEN #{infoWest} AND #{infoEast})
ORDER BY LIKE_TABLE.LIKE_COUNT DESC, P.POST_READCOUNT DESC
ORDER BY P.POST_WDATE DESC
